cards.title: Echelon
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw 2 cards, then discard 2 cards.
Move the top card of the villain deck to the bottom of the villain deck.

openingLines.default: Before we go charging in, let's figure out what we're dealing with.
openingLines.Cauldron.WinterTiamatCharacter: Such a noisy lizard. I've got the antidote for that.
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: That lizard looks meaner than before.

cards.title: Advance And Regroup
body: At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
Whenever a non-hero target is destroyed, 1 hero target regains 2 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: ...And for my next trick-
Let's just take a minute.

cards.title: Break Through
body: At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
Once during their turn, when 1 of a player's targets would deal damage, they may increase that damage by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: Now!

cards.title: Command And Conquer
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until 2 Tactics are revealed.  Shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck. Put 1 revealed Tactic into play and the other on the top or bottom of your deck.
{Echelon} deals 1 target 2 lightning or 2 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: She's got a whole team with{BR}her, and they know every move before{BR}we make it!

cards.title: Database Uplink
cards.body: At the end of your turn, you may discard a Tactic. If you do, draw a card.
powers: Put a Tactic from your hand into play.

flavorQuotes.text: I've got access to every surveillance{BR}system on the planet.{BR}So no, I wasn't listening to you.

cards.title: Find A Way In
body: At the start of a player's turn, that player may choose to skip their power Phase. If they do, they may play 1 additional card during their play Phase.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card and each hero target regains 1 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: I've disabled the{BR}motion sensors. Your target is{BR}three floors above you.

cards.title: First Responder
body: You may discard a card. If you do, put up to 2 Tactics from your trash into play.
If you did not discard a card, you may discard your hand and draw 4 cards.

flavorQuotes.text: Don't tell me you{BR}haven't missed this.

cards.title: Know Your Enemy
body: At the start of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do not, draw a card and destroy this card.
The first time a hero destroys a non-hero target each turn, you may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: If you didn't learn something,{BR}kid, you didn't really win.

cards.title: Need A Way Out
body: At the start of a player's turn, that player may choose to skip their play Phase. If they do, they may use 1 additional power during their power Phase.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card and each hero target regains 1 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: Lady, get us out of here!
What's the magical word?

cards.title: Overwatch
powers: Once before your next turn, when a hero target is dealt damage by a non-hero target, {Echelon} may deal the source of that damage 3 melee damage

flavorQuotes.text: They look left,{BR}and then I go right.

cards.title: Practiced Teamwork
body: When this card enters play, each player may draw a card.
At the start of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do not, destroy this card.
Reduce damage dealt to hero targets by hero targets by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: You've gotten{BR}much better at this!

cards.title: Remote Observation
body: At the start of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do not, draw a card and destroy this card.
During their draw Phase, heroes draw 1 additional card, then discard 1 card.

flavorQuotes.text: Before you jokers go{BR}charging in, maybe you'd like to{BR}know what we're dealing with.

cards.title: Ruthless Intimidation
body: At the start of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do not, draw a card and destroy this card.
Increase damage dealt to the non-hero target with the lowest HP by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: All gone a bit wobbly, has it?

cards.title: Staggered Assault
body: At the start of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do not, draw a card and destroy this card.
Once per turn when a hero target deals an instance of 2 or more damage, {Echelon} may deal 1 target 1 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Set 'em up...
..knock 'em down.

cards.title: Strategic Deployment
cards.body: Search your deck for a Tactic and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: I didn't ask for your opinion, I told{BR}you to start kissing sky. Now!

cards.title: Surprise Attack
body: At the start of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do not, draw a card and destroy this card.
Whenever a hero uses a power that deals damage, increase that damage by 1. You may change the type of that damage to psychic.

flavorQuotes.text: Who's there?

cards.title: Tesla Knuckles
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {Echelon} may deal 1 target X lightning damage, where X is the number of Tactics destroyed during your turn.
powers: {Echelon} deals each non-hero target 1 lightning damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Chew on this, mate!{BR}Careful, it's tangy!

cards.title: The Kestrel Mark II
powers: {Echelon} deals 1 target 1 projectile damage and regains 2 HP.
Destroy this card. One player draws 2 cards.

flavorQuotes.text: I'd like to see that oversized lizard{BR}shoot this one down.

promoCards.title: Echelon
powers: Draw a card. You may play The Kestrel Mark II from your hand.
incapacitatedAbilities: Up to 2 equipment cards may be played now.
Look at the top 3 cards of a hero deck and replace them in any order.

openingLines.Cauldron.WinterTiamatCharacter: What are you jokers waiting for? We've got a dragon that needs to be taught some manners.
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: This is where we make our stand; can't let it get past us!

promoCards.title: Echelon
powers: 1 other player draws X+1 cards, where X is the number of tactic cards destroyed this turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card now.
Play the top card of the environment deck.
Reveal the top card of 2 decks, play 1 and replace the other.

openingLines.default: Deploying surveillance drones to identify strategic weaknesses.
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: You still don't have enough eyes to see what's coming.
